information: Teamwork and the personal attention paid by José María make this an essential gastronomic venue for tourists wherever they come from. We currently have a team of 65 people who look after the: cookery, dining room service, bar, hygiene, cleaning and administration. The restaurant has eight dining rooms, a tavern-bar for receptions, two kitchens, two ovens, two cold stores and four roasting ovens. The critics currently consider the restaurant as one of the classic exponents of Segovia's cuisine.
